description: This course introduces students to Christian theology, provides an overview of central Christian beliefs (for example, about God, Christ, creation, salvation, sin, faith, the church) and critically examines their origins, meaning, coherence and contemporary validity. How should Christians understand themselves and the world in light of the God made known in Jesus Christ? Prerequisites: BTS-B.
name: Essentials Chr Theol
notes: This course does NOT fulfill a WRI requirement.
title: Essentials of Christian Theology
